popover.primary: A mastery path focused on damage from afar
A mastery path focused on faster casting shorter range damage
A mastery path focused on daemons and close combat

data.name: Enhance War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted buff. Increases damage done by that siege engine by 2% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Hex War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Increases the cooldown times of that siege engine by 50% for 10 seconds

data.name: Abate War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Decreases damage done by that siege engine to 98% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Daemonic Maw
data.description: Deals 328 Spirit damage and reduces movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Summon Pink Horror
data.description: Summons a daemonic minion who specializes in long range Elemental based attacks. This minion is confined to its summoning circle and cannot move. The daemonic minion gains 100% of your Intelligence from item bonuses and 50% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While you are within 30 feet of the minion you will be steadily empowered by its unholy energy, increasing your damage by 4% every 2 seconds to a maximum of 20%.

data.name: Resummon
data.description: You shift your active summoning circle to your current location, bringing your minion with it.

data.name: Summon Blue Horror
data.description: Summons a daemonic minion who specializes in short range Spiritual and Elemental area of effect attacks. This minion is confined to its summoning circle and cannot move. The daemonic minion gains 50% of your Intelligence from item bonuses and 100% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While you are within 30 feet of the minion you will be steadily empowered by its unholy energy, increasing your damage by 4% every 2 seconds to a maximum of 20%.

data.name: Horrifying Visions
data.description: Horrifying images distract your opponent, causing them to deal only 50% damage against you for 15 seconds.  You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.

data.name: Summon Flamer
data.description: Summons a daemonic minion who specializes in powerful moderate range Spiritual attacks. This minion is confined to its summoning circle and cannot move. The daemonic minion gains 75% of your Intelligence from item bonuses and 75% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While you are within 30 feet of the minion you will be steadily empowered by its unholy energy, increasing your damage by 4% every 2 seconds to a maximum of 20%.

data.name: Mage Bolt
data.description: A focused blast that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Grasp
data.description: A summoning wave passes over those within 25 feet of you, calling fourth tentacles to bind their movement for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Daemonic Armor
data.description: You surround yourself with daemonic protection, increasing your Armor by 560 for up to 1 hours.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: You drain power from your target, stealing up to 200 action points from your target and giving them to you. Your target's Intelligence will also be reduced by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 Action Points. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Infernal Flesh
data.description: Daemons will be summoned with 160 more Wounds.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Increases your Intelligence by 160.

data.name: Misdirection
data.description: You gain a strong counter aura for the next 10 seconds that will reduce half of any incoming Magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Unearthly Shriek
data.description:
Pink Horrors, Blue Horrors and Flamers of Tzeentch now have a 15% chance to taunt their targets with every attack. This enrages the target, interrupting any building actions and forces monsters to target your pet for 5 seconds. Taunted targets receive 20% more damage from your daemon. If your daemon is struck 3 times by their taunted target, taunt will be broken.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Shocking Jolt
data.description: You remove stagger effects from an ally and five other allies within 25 feet.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 370 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Scintillating Energy
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to your target and staggers them for 9 seconds, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Instability
data.description: You force so much power into your daemon that it explodes from within, dealing 370 Spirit damage to all targets within 25 feet, knocking them down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Sleight of Hand
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 50% less than normal.

data.name: Flame's Kiss
data.description: Rend Winds and Flickering Red Fire are now undefendable.

data.name: Grasping Darkness
data.description: Deals 798 damage over 6 seconds and Snares by 60% for 6 seconds

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Chaotic Attunement
data.description: Daemons can now be summoned instantly and the cost of Resummon is reduced to 0 Action Points.

data.name: Roiling Winds
data.description: Winds tear out from your target, dealing 300 damage to them and everyone within 20 feet every second for 4 seconds.

data.name: Infernal Pain
data.description: Surge of Insanity will now cause an additional 396 Spirit damage over 6 seconds to all targets hit.

data.name: Surging Power
data.description: Increases critical damage from Infernal Blast, Surging Violet Fire, Flickering Red Fire, and Surge of Insanity by 50%.

data.name: Conduit of Chaos
data.description: Focusing the great powers of Chaos for 10 seconds, you may tirelessly use all your abilities for no AP cost.

data.name: Swift Flames
data.description: Reduces Surging Violet Fire's cooldown by 7 seconds.

data.name: Daemonic Withering
data.description:
Withered Soul will now also cause the victim to suffer 15% more damage from all sources.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Unleash the Winds
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to all enemies within 25 feet, and for the next 10 seconds your abilities will build 50% faster, cost 25% less Action Points and you cannot be set back during this time.

data.name: Flickering Red Fire
data.description: Summons a chaotic bundle of red flame that flies toward your opponent to inflict 436 Elemental damage.

data.name: Daemonic Fire
data.description: Your Pink Horror flings daemonic fire at it's target, burning them for 291 Elemental damage and reducing Elemental Resistance by 378 for the next 20 seconds.

data.name: Baleful Transmogrification
data.description: Bends and twists your target from within to deal 1155 Elemental damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Surging Violet Fire
data.description: Tendrils of writhing violet flame coil around your target, burning them for 328 Elemental damage.

data.name: Daemonic Consumption
data.description: Your Pink Horror forces daemonic power into it's target, lowering the target's chance to critically hit by 5% and dealing 276 Elemental damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Withered Soul
data.description: Your malice is forced directly into your target's soul, inflicting 1730 Elemental damage over 20 seconds while reducing their Disrupt chance by 5%.

data.name: Mutating Blue Fire
data.description: A column of blue flame washes over your target, dealing 718 Elemental damage and then dealing an additional 576 Elemental damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Fiery Winds
data.description: Flickering Red Fire and Surging Violet Fire will hit one additional enemy up to 15 feet away from the target.

data.name: Perils of The Warp
data.description: You open a rift dealing 365 Elemental damage and weakens the fabric of reality surrounding your target, disarming them for 4 seconds.

data.name: Changer's Blessing
data.description: Surging Violet Fire will now heal you for 50% of damage dealt.

data.name: Bolt of Change
data.description: An undefendable bolt of far traveling force that inflicts 883 Elemental damage.

data.name: Chaos Unleashed
data.description: Increases the critical hit rate of all Path of Havoc spells by 15%.

data.name: Indigo Fire of Change
data.description: A horrible torrent of energy that deals 536 Elemental damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. Victims killed while bathed in this flame will return 120 Action Points over 6 seconds to you.

data.name: Soul Leak
data.description: Deals 2394 damage over 10 seconds and removes 50 Action Points every 2 seconds.

data.name: Rend Winds
data.description: Tears at your foe with fierce winds, hitting them three times for a total of 363 Spirit damage. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Glean Magic
data.description: You strip away the Spiritual protections of everyone 20 feet from your target, reducing their Spirit resistance by 378 and dealing 560 Spirit damage over 20 seconds.

data.name: Flame of Tzeentch
data.description: Your Flamer focuses two gouts of flame on it's target dealing 117 Spirit damage every 1 seconds for 2 seconds.

data.name: Flames of Change
data.description: Your Flamer hurls a gout of daemonic fire that will strike it's target and those 20 feet around them, dealing 296 Spirit damage over 6 seconds.

data.name: Surge of Insanity
data.description: A surge of chaotic bliss overcomes your target, dealing 403 Spirit damage.  The victim and any other enemies within 20 feet of them are also interruped, cancelling any abilities that they are building up. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Pandemonium
data.description: Chaotic swirls of power inflict 1055 Spirit damage over 15 seconds to your target and those within 20 feet of them. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Warping Blast
data.description: Energy spirals towards your foe, dealing 403 Spirit damage and knocking them back a short distance. Monsters will be knocked down. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Endless Pandemonium
data.description: Pandemonium will now reapply its damage effect 50% of the time after it ends or is removed.

data.name: Seed of Chaos
data.description: Grows a seed inside your target dealing 605 Spirit damage over 15 seconds. After this time expires or the target is killed, the seed will explode using the victims life force to deal 265 Spirit damage to all targets within 20 feet.

data.name: Daemonic Reach
data.description: Increases the ranges of all Path of Changing abilities by 25%.

data.name: Tzeentch's Firestorm
data.description: Creates a great column of wind and flame that deals 365 Spirit damage every 2 seconds to all targets within 10 feet of the area for 6 seconds, and snares them by 20%. This spell requires a high amount of concentration and you will be set back by .5 seconds whenever hit.

data.name: Wild Changing
data.description: Increases critical chance for all Path Of Changing spells by 15%

data.name: Dissolving Mist
data.description:
Summons a cloud of caustic mist that deals 112 Spirit damage every 2 seconds to targets within 20 feet of the summoning point. After 10 seconds the cloud doubles in strength, dealing 212 Spirit damage and 10 seconds later will double in strength again, dealing 312 Spirit damage.
If there are multiple Dissolving Mist in the same area only the highest level mist will deal damage.

data.name: Daemonic Scream
data.description: Deals 2400 damage to all targets in a line in front of you up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Infernal Blast
data.description: A daemonic wave that warps the air in front of you dealing 812 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to all targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Daemonic Lash
data.description: An ethereal tentacle swipes the target in front of you for 278 Spirit damage.

data.name: Warping Energy
data.description: Your Blue Horror spews out a cone of daemonic energy that inflicts 214 Spirit damage to targets up to 40 feet in front of Horror.

data.name: Coruscating Energy
data.description: Your Blue Horror releases a field of energy dealing 141 Elemental damage every second to all targets within 25 feet for 3 seconds.

data.name: Daemonic Infestation
data.description: You call fourth a small daemon which will persist in an area for 1 minute. The daemon will explode when an enemy gets too close, dealing 343 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggering them for 3 seconds, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Daemonic Resistance
data.description: Increases your groupmember's Corporeal resistance by 252 for 60 minutes if they are within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Warpfire
data.description: You channel warping flame through your disk, dealing 217 Elemental damage to all targets within 25 feet of you every second for 3 seconds.

data.name: Lasting Chaos
data.description: When you summon a Daemon, it will restore 20 Action Points to everyone within 25 feet every 2 seconds.

data.name: Agonizing Torrent
data.description: Your disk emanates an aura of pain that inflicts 270 Spirit damage every 3 seconds for 9 seconds.

data.name: Daemonic Contract
data.description:
Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Aegis of Orange Fire
data.description: You summon and absorb orange flames to increase your Wounds by 240, increasing your total life for 20 seconds. During this time, any enemies striking you has a 25% chance to receive 348 Elemental damage from your flames.

data.name: Daemonic Pact
data.description: Forms a pact with newly summoned daemons that increases both you and your daemon's Toughness by 160 while it remains in this realm.

data.name: Chaotic Rift
data.description: A rift in the warp is opened briefly, pulling up to six enemy players within 65 feet of the vortex towards its center and then snaring everyone within 25 feet a second later by 30% for 5 seconds. Monsters will be knocked down by the initial pull.

data.name: Firewyrm of Tzeentch
data.description: Summons a mighty Firewyrm that will rampage around attacking your enemies for 16 seconds.
